code: import React from'react';import'./StatCard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StatCard=_ref=>{let{title,value,change,changeType,icon,delay=0}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-card",style:{animationDelay:"".concat(delay,"ms")},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stat-icon",children:icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stat-change",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"change-badge ".concat(changeType),children:change})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stat-value",children:value}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stat-title",children:title})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stat-progress",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-bar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-fill ".concat(changeType),style:{width:"".concat(Math.min(parseInt(change.replace('%','').replace('+','')),100),"%")}})})})]});};export default StatCard;
